lines.text: a , b = integer array of length 200005
n , i = integer with i set to 0
for i = 0 to n exclusive read a [ i ]
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; ++ i ) cin >> a [ i ] ;

lines.text: for t = integer and i = 0 to n exclusive read t and set b [ t ] to i
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 , t ; i < n ; ++ i ) cin >> t , b [ t ] = i ;

lines.text: for i = 0 to n exclusive set a [ i ] to b [ a [ i ] ]
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; ++ i ) a [ i ] = b [ a [ i ] ] ;

lines.text: if a [ i ] is less than a [ i - 1 ] break
lines.code: if ( a [ i ] < a [ i - 1 ] ) break ;
